## Data

All the data for the book can be found in the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/StatsRhian/covid-by-numbers.github.io/tree/main/data).

### Diamonds

An example of code and plots displayed within the website.
You can download the [diamonds dataset here]("https://github.com/StatsRhian/covid-by-numbers.github.io/blob/main/data/diamonds.csv").

```{r}
library("ggplot2")

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point()
```
